execution_quality: Methodical and complete implementation with proper testing of individual components before integration, demonstrating understanding of the architecture and careful validation of each layer.
work_category: Implementation of a multi-component shell utility system for YubiKey touch notifications with context awareness, including shimmed command wrappers and fallback /proc inspection.
